item.title: About
item.description: Kyle Hopfer is from St. Louis, MO. He is currently in his junior year studying information systems at the University of Missouri-St. Louis. He is also working part time as a software developer intern at Centene Corporation in St. Louis, MO. He graduated from Lutheran High School South in 2014. Kyle is a fan of the St. Louis Cardinals and the St. Louis Blues. He enjoys spending time with family and friends and going to Bible studies at his church.

item.title: First Blog Post
item.description:
Hello, world! My name is Kyle Hopfer. This is my first blog post. I just made this website today, so I am still figuring out how everything works. I hope you enjoy my website!

Kyle Hopfer
